name: Grand Striker
overview:
A soccer game from Human (the originators of the Fire Pro Wrestling series)

This game has 5 rounds: Final Preliminary Match, Quarter Final, Semi Final, Final and a Special Match. When you win the final you get the "Human Cup" and can play against the "Sepia Dreams" team. If you defeat that team you win the "Greatest Cup" and game is over.
If the match ends in a draw there isn't a Penalty Kick, you must insert coins to continue.
